name: ComfyUI-Lun-Qwen3-tts
description: Qwen3-TTS Text-to-Speech nodes for ComfyUI. Support custom voice (9 speakers), voice design (text-to-voice), and voice cloning.
author: Lun

nodes.name: Qwen3TTS_VoiceDesign
nodes.description: Create voices from natural language descriptions

nodes.name: Qwen3TTS_VoiceClone
nodes.description: Clone voices from reference audio samples (3+ seconds)
